entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ambiguity errors reported from `SemanticModel.GetDiagnostics()` for calls to partial members on type with primary constructor #75002
    Backlog
  • [API proposal]: Add `GetSpeculativeForEachInfo` #74998

Closed

  • Roslyn fails to build with special characters in path. #55133
    17.6 P2
  • Visual Basic double to integer conversion tests stopped working in .NET 9 Preview 5 #74026
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the cancellation token from the calculation of InProgressState.LazyStaleCompilationWithGeneratedDocuments #75001
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Test attribute function pointer execution on net9 #74999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix IOperation debugging experience #74997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12

Merged

  • CodeQL suppressions #75003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix exception case in compiler resolver #75000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove debug-only assert method #74996
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fixup partial property API usage #74951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties, Next
  • Avoid BuildHost crash in Mono due to missing types #74994
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix typo in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74642
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Re-enable double-to-integer conversion tests #74980
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove toolset compiler workarounds #74990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support for per-file content exclusion in Rename Suggestions #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.12
  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
